latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required Fines pending

infractions.Violation Summary: Clearances for Director of Camp not submitted to DOHMH or on File with DOHMH
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp Director on site found to have criminal record in contraindication of NYS Correction Law 23-A
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp is not supervised by a Camp Director Director on site is not qualified is not of required age or does not have the required experience
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp Operator fails to developed and implemented Written Safety Plan Plan not reviewd and updated annually Plan not approved by DOHMH does not comply with health code and 7-25 of State Sanitary Code
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: In addition to Health Director camp fails to provide one staff member per 50 campers currently certified in standard first aid and personal safety in addition to waterfront supervisor camp fails to provide one staff member per 100 campers certified in CPR
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Adequate insurance coverage was not obtained prior to camping season Does not includes workers compensation comprehensive liability and/or motor vehicle insurance
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp Director failed to file certified conviction history document with DOHMH
